Read Mapping parameter titration pipeline¶

Author:

David Sims
Release:

$Id: mapping_titration.py 2900 2011-05-24 14:38:00Z david $
Date:

April 02, 2014
Tags:

Python

  • align reads to the genome using a range of different parameters
  • calculate alignment statistics

Requirements¶

On top of the default CGAT setup, the pipeline requires the following software to be in the path:

Program Version Purpose
bowtie >=0.12.7 read mapping

Pipline Output¶

The results of the computation are all stored in an sqlite relational database csvdb.

Glossary¶

bowtie
bowtie - a read mapper

Code¶

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.buildBAM(infile, outfile, options)¶

map reads with bowtie

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.sortByName(infile, outfile)¶

Add number of hits tags to sam file

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.addNHTag(infile, outfile)¶

Add number of hits tags to sam file

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.sortByPosition(infile, outfile)¶

Add number of hits tags to sam file

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.dedup(infiles, outfile)¶

Remove duplicate alignments from BAM files.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.loadPicardDuplicateStats(infiles, outfile)¶

Merge Picard duplicate stats into single table and load into SQLite.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.buildBAMStats(infile, outfile)¶

Count number of reads mapped, duplicates, etc.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.loadBAMStats(infiles, outfile)¶

Import bam statistics into SQLite

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.buildPicardAlignStats(infile, outfile)¶

Gather BAM file alignment statistics using Picard

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.loadPicardAlignStats(infiles, outfile)¶

Merge Picard alignment stats into single table and load into SQLite.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.mapReads()¶

Align reads to target genome.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.full()¶

run the full pipeline.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.build_report()¶

build report from scratch.

pipeline_mapping_benchmark.update_report()¶

update report.
